amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 434 to allow the EPA to regulate ozone-depleting substances under the Significant New Alternatives Policy program to improve public health and fight the root causes of climate change.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 30 printed in House Report 114-683 to strike Section 434 to allow the EPA to regulate ozone-depleting substances under the Significant New Alternatives Policy (SNAP) program to improve public health and fight the root causes of climate change.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Peters amendment (A027) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Peters amendment (A027) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A027) offered by Mr. Peters.
